help.name: aiuto
help.title: Comandi di Waterfall
help.select_category: Seleziona una categoria dal menu a tendina qui sotto per visualizzare i comandi
help.support_server: Unisciti al nostro [server di supporto](https://discord.gg/Dj5vS3mj7S) per supporto e aggiornamenti relativi al bot!

botstats.name: botstats
botstats.description: Mostra metriche di prestazioni del bot.

botstats.footer: Versione {{version}}{{canary}} • Realizzata con {{emoji}} da DevSiege Studios

mail.name: mail
mail.expired_deleted: Alcune delle tue email sono scadute ed eliminate.
mail.error_fetch: Si è verificato un errore durante il recupero della tua email.

vote.name: vote
vote.not_voted: You haven't voted yet. Vote for the bot at: [Top.gg](https://top.gg/bot/1435231722714169435/vote)
vote.already_voted: You already voted recently. You can Vote again <t:{{time}}:R>.
vote.reminders_already_enabled: You already have vote reminders enabled!
vote.reminders_description: Enable reminders to get notified when you can vote again.

preferences.name: preferences
preferences.title: User Preferences
preferences.vote_reminders_desc: Get notified when your next vote is ready.
preferences.vote_thanks_desc: Get a thank you message after you vote.

credits.name: credits
credits.description: View the credits and contributors of Waterfall
credits.title: Credits

suggestion.name: suggestion
suggestion.description: Suggest Commands or Functions for the Bot
suggestion.option_description_description: Describe in detail what you want to add/change
suggestion.title: {{type}} Suggestion
suggestion.preview_note: This is how your suggestion will be viewed to Developers.
suggestion.warning:
WARNING: If we consider your request meaningless or inappropriate we may block you from using the Waterfall Bot.
-# If you are sure that you want to submit this request, press the "Confirm" button below otherwise press the "Cancel button."
suggestion.success_description:
Your suggestion has been successfully delivered to DevSiege Studios.
We won't contact you about your suggestion unless you open a Support Ticket in our Discord Server.

report.name: report
report.description: Report a user or a bot issue/bug
report.option_type_description: What are you reporting? choose an option
report.title: {{type}} Report
report.warning:
WARNING: If we consider your report meaningless or inappropriate we can block you from using the Waterfall Bot.
-# If you are sure about your report, please press the "Confirm" button below otherwise press the "Cancel" Button.
report.error_generic: Siamo spiacenti, si è verificato un errore. Si prega di segnalarlo agli sviluppatori

automod.name: automod
automod.advanced_description: Creare regole regex avanzate con opzioni personalizzate
automod.setup_desc: Scegli una preimpostazione per impostare rapidamente le regole AutoMod per il tuo server
automod.setup_override_notice: Le regole di configurazione esistenti saranno sostituite

setup_rules.mention_spam_desc: Blocca i messaggi con troppe menzioni
setup_rules.profanity_filter_desc: Blocca volgarità e insulti usando la preimpostazione di Discord
setup_rules.link_filter_desc: Additional protection options for your server

automod.error_no_permission: You don't have permission to use this automod command.
automod.error_bot_no_permission: I need the Manage Server permission to manage AutoMod rules.
automod.error_max_rules: You have reached the maximum number of AutoMod rules ({{max}}).
automod.error_invalid_keywords: Please provide trigger keywords when creating a keyword rule.
automod.error_invalid_regex: Please provide a regex pattern when creating a regex rule.
automod.error_mention_exists: There is already a mention spam AutoMod rule in this server.
automod.error_no_log_channel: Please provide a log channel when creating an alert rule.
automod.error_max_keyword_rules: You can only have up to 6 keyword-based AutoMod rules. Delete some existing keyword rules to create new ones.
automod.block_message_default: Your message was blocked by the auto-moderation system.
automod.block_message_mentions: Your message contains too many mentions.
automod.error_log_channel_permissions: I don't have permission to view and/or send messages in {{channel}}. Alert actions will be disabled for this channel.
automod.mention_limit_desc: Maximum mentions allowed in a message
automod.advanced_timeout: Rule creation timed out after 10 minutes.
automod.advanced_success_note: The rule is now active and will filter messages based on your configuration.
automod.advanced_block_message: Your message was blocked by the advanced filter.
automod.advanced_cancel_title: Automod rule creation canceled or timed out.

keyword_options.number_variants_desc: Prevents character replacements using numbers (e.g. he11o)
keyword_options.symbol_variants_desc: Prevents character replacements using symbols (e.g. he!!o)
keyword_options.letter_variants_desc: Prevents character replacements using similar letters (e.g. heiio)
keyword_options.emoji_variants_desc: Prevents replacing characters with regional indicator emojis
keyword_options.letter_spam_desc: Prevents spamming the same character (e.g. hellllo)
keyword_options.extra_whitespace_desc: Prevents adding unnecessary spaces between characters
keyword_options.vowelless_variants_desc: Prevents removing vowels from words (may cause false positives)
keyword_options.character_deduplication_desc: Prevents repeated characters from being removed unto one (e.g. helo)
keyword_options.partial_matches_desc: Prevents adding text to the start or end of word

link_options.all_links_desc: Blocks all links with bypass protection
link_options.non_clickable_links_desc: Blocks links without https:// (may cause false positives)
link_options.inline_links_desc: Blocks disguised links with custom text
link_options.email_addresses_desc: Blocks email addresses from being shared

general_options.zalgo_warning_emoji: Some complex emojis will be blocked
general_options.zalgo_warning_accents: Accents allowed; may cause false negatives
general_options.filter_accents_desc: Blocks zalgo messages with accents (e.g. héllo)
general_options.subtext_desc: Blocks smaller text used for fake notices

automod.emoji_spam_desc: Maximum consecutive emojis allowed in a message
automod.regex_preview_desc: Here is the combined regex pattern that will be used for this rule:
automod.regex_too_long:
The generated regex pattern is too long ({{length}} characters).
Please reduce the number of protections or keywords.
You can try creating multiple rules with fewer keywords each.
automod.core_protections_desc: Select which core protections to enable

purge.name: purge
purge.error_permission: You do not have permission to use this command.
purge.error_bot_permission: I do not have ManageMessages permission in this channel.
purge.error_channel_permission: Purging more than 200 messages requires ManageChannels permission.
purge.error_invalid_amount: Please specify a valid number of messages (1 - 2,000).

logs.name: logs
logs.enable_success_desc: **{{type}}** logs will now be sent to {{channel}}.
logs.enable_exists: Log type **{{type}}** is already enabled in {{channel}}.
logs.list_desc: The current log configuration for this server
logs.list_empty: No log types are currently enabled.
logs.error_permission: You need the Manage Server permission to configure logs.
logs.error_bot_permission: I need permission to manage webhooks in that channel.
logs.error_bot_view_audit_log: I need the **View Audit Log** permission to track server events.
logs.list_error_config: An error occurred while fetching the log configuration.
logs.error: An error occurred while updating the moderation log settings.

warn.name: warn
warn.clear_description: Clear all warnings for a user
warn.option_warn_id_description: The ID of the warning to remove
warn.option_action_description: Action to take at this threshold
warn.error_hierarchy: You cannot warn this user due to role hierarchy.
warn.error_admin_only: You need Administrator permissions to use this command.
warn.dm_next_action: If you receive **{{remaining}}** more warning(s), you will be **{{action}}**.
warn.dm_failed: Could not send DM to user.
warn.no_warns: This user has no active warnings.
warn.max_warns_reached: {{user}} already has the maximum of 7 warnings. Cannot add more warnings.
warn.no_warns_found: No warnings found for this user.
warn.warn_not_found: Warning not found. It may have already been removed.
warn.clear_confirm_desc:
Are you sure you want to clear all **{{count}}** warnings for **{{user}}**?
This action cannot be undone.

convert.data_description: Convert data / file size (e.g., MB to GB)

convert.power_description: Convert power & energy (e.g., W to kW)
convert.option_timezone_description: Timezone for parsing the query (defaults to UTC)
convert.option_time_description: Time to convert (optional, defaults to now)
convert.error_currency_fetch: Failed to fetch currency rates. Please try again later.
convert.result_too_large: Result too large to display raw

serverstats.name: serverstats
serverstats.admin_only: Only a server administrator can enable/disable server statistics.
serverstats.enabled_success: Server stats tracking has been enabled!
serverstats.disabled_success: Server stats tracking has been disabled.
serverstats.already_enabled: Server stats tracking is already enabled.
serverstats.already_disabled: Server stats tracking is already disabled.
serverstats.not_enabled: Server stats is not enabled. An administrator can enable it with `/serverstats enable`.
serverstats.no_data: No statistics data available yet. Check back later!
serverstats.no_vc_data: No voice channel data available yet.
serverstats.no_invite_data: No invite tracking data available yet.
serverstats.overview_description: View server stats overview with message graph
serverstats.option_days_description: Number of days to show (7, 14, or 30)
serverstats.activity_description: View peak hours and activity patterns
serverstats.leaderboard_remaining_time: ...and {{count}} more with a total time of {{time}}
serverstats.export_description: Export server stats as CSV or JSON
serverstats.export_admin_only: You need 'Manage Server' permission to export server statistics.
serverstats.export_setup_success: Auto-export enabled! Stats will be sent to {{channel}} every 30 days.
serverstats.export_dev_only: Instant exports are restricted at the moment. Use the `channel` option to set up automatic monthly exports.
serverstats.export_contents: Contains: Summary, Top 100 Channels, Top 100 Users, Voice by Channel/User
serverstats.cooldown: Server statistics can be viewed again {{time}}.

bot_detection.name: bot-detection
bot_detection.error_no_permission: You need the **Manage Server** permission to use this command.
bot_detection.error_generic: An error occurred. Please try again later.
bot_detection.setup_desc: Configure automatic detection and action for spam bots
bot_detection.enable_detection_desc: Automatically analyze new members for bot-like behavior
bot_detection.allow_timeout_desc: Automatically timeout suspicious users based on confidence
bot_detection.allow_kick_desc: Instantly kick users with very high bot confidence
bot_detection.log_alerts_desc: Send alerts to your moderation log channel
bot_detection.logs_not_configured: Moderation logs not configured. Use /logs enable first.
bot_detection.detection_checks_desc: Choose which factors to check for new members
bot_detection.check_default_avatar_desc: Flag users with no custom avatar (+15%)
bot_detection.check_age_10m_desc: Flag accounts created less than 10 minutes ago (+30%)
bot_detection.check_age_1h_desc: Flag accounts created less than 1 hour ago (+20%)
bot_detection.check_age_1d_desc: Flag accounts created less than 24 hours ago (+10%)
bot_detection.check_age_1w_desc: Flag accounts created less than 7 days ago (+5%)
bot_detection.check_message_desc: Monitor first-hour message patterns (spam, links, mentions)
bot_detection.alt_detection_desc: Detect potential alt accounts and ban evaders
bot_detection.enable_alt_detection_desc: Check if new accounts might be ban evaders
bot_detection.alt_action_desc: What to do when an alt is detected
bot_detection.setup_timeout: Setup timed out due to inactivity.
bot_detection.setup_success_desc: Your bot detection settings have been saved.
bot_detection.save_error: Failed to save settings. Please try again.
bot_detection.not_configured_desc: Use /bot-detection setup to configure detection settings.
bot_detection.status_enabled: Bot detection is enabled and monitoring new members.

hangman.name: hangman
hangman.description: Play the daily Hangman word game

hangman.no_word_set: No word has been set yet. Try again later!
hangman.word_expired: The current word has expired. A new word will be set soon!
hangman.already_failed: You already tried today's word. Good luck next time!
hangman.session_error: Failed to start game session. Please try again.
hangman.word_expired_mid: The word expired while you were playing. Wait for a new word!
hangman.session_expired: Your game session expired. Use /hangman to start a new game.
hangman.word_was_hidden: The word was: ||I guess you'll never know||

set-hangman.name: set-hangman
set-hangman.invalid_word: Word must contain only letters and be 3-20 characters long.
set-hangman.scheduled_note: This word will be used when the current word expires.
